text_block_list.text: ――Oh, you came at just the right time.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
During a lunch break, I was walking around 
school when I ran in to Mejiro Ramonu.
Would you mind modeling for my Croquis drawing?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
If I recall, Croquis was usually a 『Simple sketch 
in a short amount of time』. Basically to create a 
『Snapshot』 of rough shapes and movements.
choice_data_list: So, abstract isn't your only style
So, abstract isn't your only style

text_block_list.text: ……Of course it isn't.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
I happened to notice another drawing board leaning against a tree. 
You could tell she was skilled at just a glance.
What?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
There were several pictures stacked together. 
They were very realistic, and strangely, you could 
almost feel the atmosphere coming from them……
Are you finished yet?
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: A perfect tableau, requires perfect scrutiny.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
With only passion, love just becomes ego. 
Races are the same……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: Alright……over there.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
『Change poses every 30 seconds』 is what she said as 
she set the alarm on her smartphone and started drawing.

……observing is more important than drawing. 
Take a look……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
What she showed me was multiple human-shaped figures 
drawn with simple lines. Eyes and noses were barely 
drawn and the faces only had two intersecting lines.
Is that so? ――We're continuing.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
――And now we were about 20 poses in. 
We should be almost done, right……?

I didn't really know much about drawing anyways. 
After thinking for a bit, a few ideas came to 
mind, based on paintings I had seen before……
Oh, that's………… Heh……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
It was a pose from a painting about races done by a 
famous painter from my hometown. I fell in love with 
it the moment I saw it in some local official building.
Hmmmm……I love it too. That painting.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
I couldn't help but speak passionately. The painting 
was not only beautiful, but it was about the racing 
world. Each brush stroke was beautiful――!
…………I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
Before I realized it, Mejiro Ramonu had 
packed up her tools as the afternoon bell rang.
It's fine? I don't see an issue……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: With that kind of love……
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
However, several days after that. 
While we were discussing the schedule as usual――
……So, you won't be here on these days.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
choice_data_list: Heading back home for a bit

text_block_list.text: Oh, I see.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text: I don't know where it is but……it must be far, huh.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu

text_block_list.text:
I just told her about my hometown recently too. 
But for her, I guess it was something unimportant.

But that didn't matter. Just being together 
because we had the same aspirations was enough……!
